backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature implementations, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and their roles in the application.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes along with global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and sets the page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing navigation between views, cart state, and order confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/CartView.tsx: Renders the cart UI with item lists, quantity controls, subtotal, empty state, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutView.tsx: Checkout form collecting customer info, validating input, showing order summary, and submitting orders to backend.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Displays order confirmation details including order ID, items, totals, and a button to continue shopping.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Shows detailed product information with image, description, price, and an add‑to‑cart option, handling missing products gracefully.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Renders a grid of product cards with images, descriptions, prices, and buttons to view details or add items to the cart.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header component displaying the shop title and a cart button showing the current item count.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product interface and provides a static list of seeded sports products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and related state tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/orders.ts: Builds and sends an order creation request to the backend using cart and customer info, returning the created order ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning, extended theme settings, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin imports.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including versioning, feature list, requirements mapping, and notes for a Sports Shop web app.
